xal.model.alg

Class SynchronousTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.model.alg.Tracker
      • xal.model.alg.SynchronousTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, IAlgorithm, IArchive, IContextAware

    public class SynchronousTracker
extends Tracker
    Algorithm for propagating a SynchronousParticle probe object through any modeling element that exposes the IComponent interface.
